comment.body:
I gave the user rule below a try, but it still breaks https://login.portfolioonline.com.au<https://login.portfolioonline.com.au/>
The only thing that works for me is to disable protect from DPI

From: zloyden ***@***.***>
Sent: Thursday, 6 April 2023 4:39 PM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: Anthony ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] login.portfolioonline.com.au (Issue #147404)


Strange, but I don't see any problem with that option.
Could you open the site with this rule in User rules?

@@||portfolioonline.com.au^$stealth

-
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147404#issuecomment-1498565563>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEDKYWDCTL5N5ILOWGKEBQTW7ZQJJANCNFSM6AAAAAAWSVUTDA>.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.******@***.***>>

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareup.cash

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

uxh52u-dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com

We can add dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com without the || or -

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Amazon ads leftover in Voice Record Pro app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version not sure ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://apps.apple.com/app/id546983235 ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard DNS filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The app Voice Record Pro has leftover Amazon ads at the bottom. The ad disappears after a while and never returns back, until you close and reload the app. 2. The offending ad url is bjads.bejbej.ca. I request you to add this url to your DNS service filter 3. I’m using Adguard free DNS service, which only uses base DNS filter 4. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147497#issuecomment-1500421966 -  It's related to this - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/1486 and it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`.
So please add this rule:
```adblock
youtube.com#@$##contentContainer.tp-yt-app-drawer[swipe-open].tp-yt-app-drawer::after, tp-yt-app-drawer { position: absolute !important; }
```
to user rules or disable `Help with the development of AdGuard filters` in AdGuard's settings or disable `Web Annoyances Ultralist`.

<hr>

I cannot reproduce ads.

comment.body:
I still haven't been able to reproduce it on my end.
1. Disable all filters
2. Leave only stealth mode with the option `Protect from DPI`
3. Try this
```adblock
@@||login.portfolioonline.com.au^$stealth
```
4. If the rule above does not help, remove it
5. Open the filtering log
6. Reproduce the problem
7. Try to find the requests that have `TLS SNI` error.
8. Write them here or send the screenshot. Note that the screenshots you can only send via github.

@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers please take a look at this.

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

Также можете включить `AdGuard Popups filter`. Он помогает в некоторых особых случаях.

issue.title: Amazon ads leftover in Voice Record Pro app

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version not sure ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? comment.body:
The provided offending filter is the formatted version used internally by uBlock Origin. Here's the original entry.
`||widget.intercom.io^$third-party,domain=~app.rezi.io|~intercom.com|~backerclub.co|~quidco.com|~green.energy|~artisthub.io`
But I think you get the idea.

I checked that, and yes. It blocks blank spaces of share buttons.

comment.body:
In fact, this is not the incorrect blocking. The third-party widget is blocked, as mentioned in the description.
There are some ways to use the widget on your side.
* Add to My filters this rule `@@||widget.intercom.io^$domain=platform.openai.com` or `@@||widget.intercom.io^`.
* Use [our new filters](https://adguard.com/en/blog/new-annoyance-filters.html) (without AdGuard Widgets) instead of AdGuard Annoyances. To do this:

	* Add the links below at the end of the Filter list - import

	```
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/18.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/19.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/20.txt
	https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/21.txt
	```

comment.body:
Hello,
I have checked it out with AdGuard for Android (with AdGuard Chinese filter enabled) and ads are blocked on my device (mobile version).
Regarding iOS, content blockers work only in Safari web browser, so these ads in Chrome will be not blocked.
I don't have iPhone, but on iPad (on desktop version of website, I'm not sure how to change it to mobile) ads are blocked on my end.
In this case, `Advanced protection` (it's available in AdGuard settings) is required to block these ads, though I don't know if it works, because I cannot check it out.

By the way, content blockers on iOS have limited abilities (some rules do not work, some are executed too late), so some ads cannot be blocked.
